author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
Sam Fender's new album "People Watching" comes out in February and I'm reviewing its title track. I'm a big fan of Sam Fender and I was sorry to hear about the trouble he's having with one of his vocal cords. I have everything crossed for him. 
Portions of "People Watching" had to be cut for copyright reasons, so if you want to hear the whole track uninterrupted, follow: https://youtu.be/DHzaHMmXB6Y?si=mxUVyDWsGPqwgykG

'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March - and we'll be going on tour:  
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
Our single, The Longest Kiss is here:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spo
title: Sam Fender: A Musical Savant
